products.name: Activated Carbon Powder
products.description: Activated Carbon for purest water quality
products.detailedDescription: Activated Carbon has been used as an adsorbent for centuries early uses of carbon were reported for water filtration and for sugar solution purification. Activated carbons ability to remove a large variety of compounds from contaminated waters has led to its increased use in the last thirty years. Recent changes in water discharge standards regarding toxic pollutants has placed additional emphasis on this technology. Granulated carbons are used for water treatment, deodorization and separation of components of flow system. We are offering a range of Granular Activated Carbon for Water Purification to our client depending upon mesh size, iodine content, etc.

products.name: Silica Sand
products.description: High-purity Silica Sand for water treatment, construction, glass manufacturing, and industrial applications – durable, reliable, and eco-friendly.
products.detailedDescription:
Silica Sand – Premium Quality for Industrial & Commercial Use

Our Silica Sand is a high-grade, naturally occurring mineral widely used in water treatment, glass manufacturing, construction, and industrial applications. With its high silica content, consistent grain size, and excellent chemical purity, it is one of the most reliable filtration and processing media available.

products.name: Pebbles
products.description: Natural Pebbles Media for water treatment, filtration plants, landscaping, and construction – durable, eco-friendly, and long-lasting performance.
products.detailedDescription:
Pebbles Media – Reliable Filtration & Multi-Purpose Use

Our Pebbles Media is a natural, hard, and durable material widely used in water treatment plants, sand filters, landscaping, and construction applications. Carefully graded and screened, these pebbles provide excellent support media for sand, anthracite, and other filter materials, ensuring maximum efficiency in filtration processes.

products.name: Gravels
products.description: High-quality Gravel Media for water filtration, wastewater treatment, and construction applications – durable, natural, and long-lasting support media.
products.detailedDescription:
Gravel Media – Strong & Reliable Filtration Support

Our Gravel Media is a naturally hard, durable, and chemically inert material used as a support media in water filtration systems and construction applications. With consistent grain size and high strength, gravel ensures efficient water flow, improved filtration, and long service life of treatment plants.

products.name: Core Sand
products.description: High-purity Silica Sand for water treatment, construction, glass manufacturing, and industrial applications – durable, reliable, and eco-friendly.
products.detailedDescription:
Core Sand – Premium Quality for Industrial & Commercial Use

Our Silica Sand is a high-grade, naturally occurring mineral widely used in water treatment, glass manufacturing, construction, and industrial applications. With its high silica content, consistent grain size, and excellent chemical purity, it is one of the most reliable filtration and processing media available.

products.name: Anthracite Media
products.description: High-grade Anthracite Filter Media for water treatment, wastewater purification, and industrial filtration – durable, efficient, and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription:
Anthracite Filter Media – Premium Quality for Water Treatment

Our Anthracite Filter Media is a high-carbon, durable filtration material widely used in multimedia filters, drinking water plants, wastewater treatment, and industrial filtration systems. With its angular shape and high hardness, anthracite provides excellent turbidity removal, improved filtration rates, and longer filter runs compared to sand alone.

products.name: Powder Activated Carbon
products.description: High-quality Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) for water purification, wastewater treatment, air filtration, and industrial applications – fine, efficient, and fast-acting.
products.detailedDescription:
Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) – Fast-Acting & High Adsorption

Our Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) is a fine, high-purity adsorbent made from natural raw materials such as coconut shells and coal. Known for its large surface area, high adsorption capacity, and quick action, PAC is widely used in drinking water purification, wastewater treatment, food & beverage processing, and air purification.

products.name: MNo2
products.description: High-purity Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media for efficient removal of iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from water – durable and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription:
Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) Filter Media – Effective Iron & Manganese Removal

Our Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media is a naturally occurring mineral specially processed for water treatment applications. Known for its strong oxidizing and catalytic properties, MnO₂ efficiently removes iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide (H₂S) from groundwater and industrial water supplies.
